name: A Trip to the Store at Night
name_original: A Trip to the Store at Night
description:
Guy is really hungry. He hasn't eaten for days. Will he be able to make it to the store and back in this surrealist visual novel.

There's a lot of things you can do at night. So many wacky characters.

Date the girl who lives on your swing set

Have tea with a green man

Watch TV with the Mothman

and more.
